items.sentence: Mary came out of the bathroom with only a towel on.
Mary was afraid that no one would ask her to dance.
I always drink a glass of milk before going to bed.
I asked Tom how much time he thought it would take.
I burst out laughing when I saw what Tom was doing.
I came here to discuss a personal problem with you.
I can sing this song without looking at the lyrics.
I can understand French better than I can speak it.
Tom thought Mary was just kidding, but she wasn\'t.
I want a boat that will take me far away from here.
